## 결과 
🔻예시
### [GET] /api/v1/members
```json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "SUCCESS",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "content": "카카오 댓글4",
        "isRemoved": false,
        "isAuthor": true,
        "commentWriterInfoDto": {
            "writerId": 1,
            "nickname": "kukuku",
            "profileImageUrl": "imageurl.com",
            "kuddyLevel": "EXPLORER"
        },
        "createdDate": "2023-09-06T13:04:27.1727172",
        "replyList": null,
        "parentId": null
    }
}
```
